<Text: Dar al-Hikma (Arabic: دار الحكمة‎ ‎ , 'House of Wisdom') was an underground publishing house, set up by the Iraqi Communist Party in September 1945.>

--------------------
Text: Dar al-Hikma (Iraqi publishing house):  It issues Arabic translations on Friedrich Engels' "Origin of the Family", Maxim Gorky's "Mother" and texts of Stalin on dialectics and historical materialism.
